name: Union Carrier
desc:
2 monsters with the same Type or Attribute
Cannot be used as Link Material the turn it is Link Summoned. You can target 1 face-up monster you control; equip 1 monster with the same original Type or original Attribute as the targeted monster from your hand or Deck to it as an Equip Spell that makes it gain 1000 ATK, but if you equipped from your Deck, you cannot Special Summon monsters with the same name as that Monster Card for the rest of this turn. You can only use this effect of "Union Carrier" once per turn.
